page.title: 05Cockermouth school 1.
page.content: Cockermouth school is a comprehensive which was formed 10th september 1984 by the amalgamation of two schools: Cockermouth Grammar and Derwent secondary. we are concerned with the new castlegate site. This building caters for pupils ranging from the age of 13-16. The headmistress over both sites is Miss Mc Murtry. The castlegate building is quite modern and holds roughly 460 pupils. It also plays a large part in the organisation of youth activities for the area. The building is also used as a further education centre in the evenings.It houses some very good netball and football teams which use the site's sporting facilities for training.
